title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Blended-Based Social Leadership Capacity Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Organizational management and basic leadership theory understanding
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex social leadership problems and propose solutions according to Bloom’s Taxonomy application methods.

Learners will conduct quarterly communication strategy workshops with peer leaders using collaboration tools (Slack, Microsoft Teams, etc.) according to the Redecker classification system (4 types: drivers, expressers, relayers, analyzers) and achieve ≥20% improvement in team communication efficiency scores via pre-post surveys
Learners can design educational modules integrating digital-face-to-face learning environments by referencing the Guerra scale.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
